text: where z(τ, d 0 ) = τ − t � + d 0 + 1 and t � represents the first exposure time (4 Aug 2014). For case j in Group 2, the case has an interval-censored observation for exposure date t e j , ranging from the first date of visit E L j to the last date of visit E R j (i.e., t e j 2 ðE L j ; E R j �) [44, 45] .
